title: Help with my account
body:
Hello! Sorry if this isn't the right place...
I created an account before 2 or 3 years, but the email wasn't mine. I played 2 weeks and leave the acc. Today I try to sing up and guess what? The pass was incorrect! I dont know my email and password... I see matches and someone still play... I know the old password and the login name. I just dont know the email and the new pass. Does someone hack the acc? Please help me! Tnx...
+This acc is EUNE

replies.body: If you think someone might have hacked your account, your best bet would be to reach out to us through our [**Account Recovery Form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). It's okay that you can't get logged in, because we'll need you to stay signed out in order to get you in control of your account again!
I make the "Account Recovery Form"... Now i must wait, right?
